name: MudRunner: Old-timers
summary:
Expand your MudRunner experience with the Old-timers DLC. Drive 2 new vintage General Motors trucks and explore the brand new Rocky Hills map designed to challenge your pick-up truck mastery.

This pack includes:
The Rocky Hills map, a brand new sandbox environment without garages.
Chevrolet Napco 3100 (1957, 4x4 scout vehicle).
GMC DW950 (1952-54, truck).
Loaded log cart add-on, able to carry 2 points.
Scout trailer add-on, fitted with 1 garage point.
